gurmukhi: bwhin isMG BieAwnk rUp liKE sB dYq mhwN fr pwieE ]
transliteration: Baahan(i) Singh Bhaiaanak Roop Lakhio Sabh Dait Mahaan Dar Paaio||
translation: Seeing the dreadful form of Chandi (whose vehicle is the lion). All the demons were filled with awe.

gurmukhi: sMK lIey kr c`kR Aau b`kR srwsn p`qR bic`qR bnwieE ]
transliteration: Sankh Looe Kar Chakkra Au Bakkra Saraasan Pattra Bachittra Banaaio||
translation: She manifested herself in queer form, holding the conch, disc and bow in her hand.

gurmukhi: Dwie Bujw bl Awpn hÍY hm so iqn XO Aiq ju`Du mcwieE ]
transliteration: Dhaae Bhujaa Bal Aapan Hvai Ham So Tin Yau At(i) Juddh(u) Machaaio||
translation: Rasktavija moved forward and knowing his superb strength, he challenged the goddess for a fight.

gurmukhi: kRu`D kY sRaunq ibMd khY rn ieAw hI qy cMfkw nwm khwieE ]153]
transliteration: Kruddh Kai Sraounat Bind Kahai Ran Iaa Hoo Te Channdakaa Naam Kahaaio||153||
translation: And said, “Thou has named thyself as Chandika come forward to fight with me.”153.

gurmukhi: mwir lieE dil Aaur BijE qb kop kY Awpn hI su iBirE hY ]
transliteration: Daar(i) Laio Dal(i) Aur Bhajio Tab Kip Kai Aapan Hoo Su Bhirio Hai||
translation: When the army of Raktavija was was destroyed or ran away, then in great fury, he himself came forward to fight.

gurmukhi: cMif pRcMif so ju`Du kirE As hwiQ CuitE mn nwih igirE hY ]
transliteration: Channd(i) Prachanndd(i) So Juddh(u) Kario As Haath(i) Chhoutio Man Naah(i) Girio Hai||
translation: He fought a very fierce battle with Chandika and (while fighting) his sword fell down from his hand, but he did not lose heart.

gurmukhi: lY kY kuvMf krM bl Dwr kY sROn smUh mY AYsy qirE hY ]
transliteration: Lai Kai Kuvand Karan Bal Dhaar Kai Sraoun Samoond Mai Aise Tario Hai||
translation: Taking the bow in hand and recouping his strength, he is swimming in the ocean of blood like this;

gurmukhi: dyv Adyv smuMd miQE mwno mor ko m`iD DirE su iPirE hY ]154]
transliteration: Dev Adev Samounnd Mathio Maano Mer Ko Maddh(i0 Dhario Su Phirio Hai||154||
translation: As though he wass the Sumeru mountain like the one used at the time of churning of ocean by the gods and demons.154.

gurmukhi: kRu`D kY ju`D ko dYq blI nd sROn ko qYr ky pwr pDwirE ]
transliteration: Kruddh Kai Juddh Ko Dait Badoo Nad Sraoun Ko Tiar Ke Paar Padhaario||
translation: The powerful demon waged the war with great anger and swam over and crossed the ocean of blood.

gurmukhi: lY krvwr Aau Fwr sMBwr kY isMG ko daur ky jwie hkwirE ]
transliteration: Lai Karvaar Au Dhaar Sanbhaar Kai Singh Ko Daur Ke Jaae Hakaario||
translation: Holding his sword and controlling his shield, he ran forward and challenged the lion.

gurmukhi: Awvq pyiK kY cMf kuvMf qy bwn ligE qn mUrC pwirE ]
transliteration: Aavat Pekh(i) Kai Channd Kuvand Te Baan Lagio Tan Moondachh Paario||
translation: Seeing his coming, Chandi shot an arrow from her bow, which caused the demon to become unconscious and fall down.

gurmukhi: rwm ky BRwqn ijau hnUmwn ko sYl smyq Drw pr fwirE ]155]
transliteration: Raam Ke Bhraatan Jio Hanoomaan Ko Sail Samet Dharaa Par Daario||155||
translation: It seemed that the brother of Rama (Bharat) had caused Hanuman to fall down with he mountain.155.
